description: T1 (T763): x1  Lombardy Poplar. Suggested work - fell to ground level and replace. Reason - excessive basal decay as evidenced by a Detailed Decay Evaluation Assessment
decision_conditions: This consent is valid for 2 YEARS ONLY.
All tree works shall be carried out in accordance with BS3998:2010 and in line with current Aboricultural best practice.

Before the felling works hereby permitted commence on site, full details and specification for a proposal to provide one tree to replace that to be removed by virtue of this consent, shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority. The proposals must be undertaken at the site in the first planting season [November to March] or part thereof following the commencement of works on site.  The Local Planning Authority shall be informed in writing once the replacement tree has been planted.  The Council suggests a Sorbus aria (14-16 cm dia) but is open to other suggestions. The details and specification above shall be submitted formally as discharge of condition application.Reason: In the interests of visual amenity and in order to maintain tree population at this site after the removal of the preserved tree[s] and in accordance with the requirements of Section 206 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
